original_title: Saturday Night Live: The Best of Molly Shannon
overview: Shannon's unmistakable comedy antics are in full effect in this collection of sketches from SNL's wild alumna. Laugh along with her fearlessly funny characters like brazen schoolgirl Mary Katherine Gallagher and Joyologist Helen Madden. Plus, see sketches that were cut after dress rehearsal.
title: Saturday Night Live: The Best of Molly Shannon
